descriptionHtml:
This is Elena

Elena is a little different from most Bretons, she\'s half breton and half altmer.

---------
TRAITS

15% resistance to magic
10% chance to absorb magicka from spells
30 bonus to magica
Highborn Power rather than Dragonskin

--------
LOCATION

She is standing at the entrance to Riverwood at level 1, with the options to fast travel to;

Guardian Stones -------- to choose initial sign
Solitude
Windhelm  -------------- ability to instantly choose faction for the game

-------

ITEMS

She is carrying 

1 full set of iron armour
1 full set of fur armour
1 Novice robe and hood
an iron sword, dagger and greatsword
a longbow
   and
30 iron arrows

with all the above you can just begin playing the game however you want

-------
APEARANCE

to get her looking exactly as she does in the pictures you will need the following mods:

No More Blocky Faces --- by Xenius
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30

Coverwomen, look 3 --- by mrLenski
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563


Eyebrows Match Hair --- by Aluminumfoil
www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=627


I can also highly recommend;
Straight hair retexture --- by navetsea    (i wasn\'t using it whilst screencapping, but it does improve the look a great deal
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333

ALL CREDIT FOR THOSE MODS GOES TO THEIR RESPECTIVE CREATORS
thankyou so much for your work guys, it\'s astounding

-------
INSTALL

incase you didnt know simply download the file (manually) and cut or copy the Elena Start.ess
into your skyrim saves folder;
normally in:  C:\\Users\\(Username)\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves

------

KNOWN ISSUES

it\'s a pretty simple file but somehow I\'ve still messed atleast one thing up, I can\'t seem to remove the Dragonskin perk from her,
she has both the highborn and dragonskin perk, any help with this matter is greatly appreciated.

LEGAL JARGON

Do what you like with this mod, if you wish to use this mod to promote one of your or in conjuncture with an original work of your own feel free and any credit to me is appreciated
However, I do not give permission for you to simply reupload this file as it is and claim it as your own work, 
everything else is fair game and does not require my permission.

Enjoy,
      ayet0
author: ayet0
